titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman at New-Market giving a full and true account of the dreadful fire that began there on Thursday, the 22d of this instant March, about nine of the clock in the evening.
titleStmt.author: J. S.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed: New-Market, Friday morning, three of the clock, 23d. of March, 1683. J.S.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
